verses.roman:
jala-pātra-vastra vahi' tomā-saṅge yābe
ye tomāra icchā, kara, kichu nā balibe

synonyms: jala-pātra—waterpot; vastra—and garments; vahi'-carrying; tomā-saṅge—with You; yābe—will go; ye—whatever; tomāra icchā—Your desire; kara—You do; kichu nā balibe—he will not say anything.
translation: "He will carry Your waterpot and garments. You may do whatever You like; he will not say a word."
